metadata.name: The Hiding of Isaac
metadata.description:
The Hiding of Isaac is a stealth focused mod for AB+. It's is very early development so do not expect a full fledged experience now.
The general idea is to make a game mode where you sneak around the levels, bypass enemies, pick locks, backstab and stealth around enemies.
Follow the mod on GitHub: https://github.com/olafurw/the-hiding-of-isaac
